modelCorrections.rawOutput:
Here's the correction for the given HTML based on the WCAG 2.1 violation description:

*Extracted text from website*: "Welcome!"
- Incorrect HTML: <html>
- Thought: The <html> element is missing the "lang" attribute. Based on the extracted text "Welcome!", the language appears to be English. I will add the "lang" attribute with the value "en" to specify the language of the document.
- Corrected HTML: <html lang="en">
